4302720.name: Vampír: Vengeance
4302720.description:
THE HUNT BEGINS

Europe, late 1990s.

You’re a special ops soldier transformed into something inhuman. Cursed with vampiric abilities, you descend into the criminal underworld - hunting those who created you. Explore the shadowy cities of 90s Europe, from Berlin to Paris, and uncover a world never meant to be seen by humans.

Vampír: Vengeance is a fast-paced first-person shooter built around parkour movement, exploration and aggressive combat.

MOVE LIKE A PREDATOR

Speed and momentum are your greatest weapons. Run, vault, and climb through rooftops, corridors, and underground spaces. Master parkour-driven traversal to control vertical space, outmaneuver enemies, and strike from unexpected angles.

FAST-PACED, BRUTAL COMBAT

Combat in Vampír: Vengeance is fast, brutal, and unforgiving. Use firearms, vampiric abilities, and the environment to overwhelm your enemies before they overwhelm you. 

EXPLORE THE UNDERWORLD

The world of Vampír blends gritty 90s crime-thriller aesthetics with subtle supernatural horror. As you explore, you’ll uncover weapons, gear, and fragments of lore that reveal the true scale of the corruption beneath Europe’s cities.

PUZZLES AND CHALLENGES

Progress isn’t just about firepower. Environmental puzzles will challenge your awareness, timing, and mastery of movement.

KEY FEATURES

  • Fast-paced first-person shooter with aggressive, momentum-driven combat

  • Fluid parkour movement: running, vaulting, and climbing

  • Exploration-driven level design with environmental storytelling

  • Vampiric powers integrated into combat and traversal

  • A wide range of puzzles and challenges

  • A dark, grounded 90s European setting


Vampír: Vengeance is a game about speed, violence, and control. Will you succumb to the monster within - or retain your humanity?
